actions.name: BatchCheckLayerAvailability
actions.description: Grants permission to check the availability of multiple image layers in a specified registry and repository

actions.name: BatchDeleteImage
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a list of specified images within a specified repository

actions.name: CompleteLayerUpload
actions.description: Grants permission to inform Amazon ECR that the image layer upload for a specified registry, repository name, and upload ID, has completed

actions.name: CreateRepository
actions.description: Grants permission to create an image repository

actions.name: DeleteRepository
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an existing image repository

actions.name: DeleteRepositoryPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the repository policy from a specified repository

actions.name: DescribeImageTags
actions.description: Grants permission to describe all the image tags for a given repository

actions.name: DescribeImages
actions.description: Grants permission to get metadata about the images in a repository, including image size, image tags, and creation date

actions.name: DescribeRegistries
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the catalog data associated with a registry

actions.name: DescribeRepositories
actions.description: Grants permission to describe image repositories in a registry

actions.name: GetAuthorizationToken
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a token that is valid for a specified registry for 12 hours

actions.name: GetRegistryCatalogData
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the catalog data associated with a registry

actions.name: GetRepositoryCatalogData
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the catalog data associated with a repository

actions.name: GetRepositoryPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the repository policy for a specified repository

actions.name: InitiateLayerUpload
actions.description: Grants permission to notify Amazon ECR that you intend to upload an image layer

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list the tags for an Amazon ECR resource

actions.name: PutImage
actions.description: Grants permission to create or update the image manifest associated with an image

actions.name: PutRegistryCatalogData
actions.description: Grants permission to create and update the catalog data associated with a registry

actions.name: PutRepositoryCatalogData
actions.description: Grants permission to update the catalog data associated with a repository

actions.name: SetRepositoryPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to apply a repository policy on a specified repository to control access permissions

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to tag an Amazon ECR resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to untag an Amazon ECR resource

actions.name: UploadLayerPart
actions.description: Grants permission to upload an image layer part to Amazon ECR Public
